archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1083
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a marketer I want to send a notification if a customer is near a location where a reward is offerred (ie in a mall by the cinema or a coffee shop), so that I can surprise customers with local and time relevant rewards

properties.value: [CLM] Geofencing for loyalty offers, require Mobile App development if NOOTB Mobile Loyalty App is used SC: Push notifications to the app (outside Comarch solution) Needs to be forwarded and discussed in CCM

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
